original_text:
Meanwhile Jesus stood before the governor, and the governor asked him, “Are you the king of the Jews?”
“You have said so,” Jesus replied.
korean_text: 예수께서 총독 앞에 섰으매 총독이 물어 이르되 네가 유대인의 왕이냐 예수께서 대답하시되 네 말이 옳도다 하시고

sentences.original_text: Meanwhile Jesus stood before the governor
sentences.korean_translation: 그 동안 예수님은 총독 앞에 서셨다

sentences.original_text: Are you the king of the Jews?
